11.heading: Maki, Yoko.
11.title: Aishiteruze Baby
11.author: story and art by Yoko Maki ; English translation & adaptation, Marie Cochrane.
notes: (Shojo Beat Manga)
First published in Japan in 2002 by Shueisha, Inc.

"Kippei Katakura is a 17-year-old playboy who spends his time chasing girls, careless of their feelings. But when his 5-year-old cousin Yuzuyu comes to live with his family after her mother's sudden disappearance, Kippei is put in charge of taking care of her. As Kippei gets to know Yuzuyu and starts to understand how she feels, he also begins to realize that all girls were like Yuzuyu once."

110.heading: Making Love.
110.title: "Shells" 9 p. in Carapaces
110.author: Luc & François Schuiten (Hollywood, CA : Humanoids Publishing, 2001).

publication info.place: This story appears also in Heavy Metal, no. 3 (June 1977), p. 89-96, and in Heavy Metal's Greatest Hits (Heavy Metal Special ; v. 8, no. 2) (New York

notes: Summary: In a negative-looking future, amid mechanical ruins of an earlier human civilization, two people remove their artificial carapaces to make love. They are overwhelmed, killed and devoured by insects. As they undress, the pages gradually move from monochrome to color, but after the insects have finished feeding the color is gone.

111.heading: Making Love.

Undated strip; date is that of publication in Between the Lines.
